channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Earliest deep-cave ritual compound in Southwest Asia discovered
item.description: A cave in Galilee, Israel, has yielded evidence for ritualistic gathering 35,000 years ago, the earliest on the Asian continent.

item.title: Not so simple machines: Cracking the code for materials that can learn
item.description: Physicists have devised an algorithm that provides a mathematical framework for how learning works in lattices called mechanical neural networks.
